thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Trump Administration Shuffles CFPB’s Lending-Discrimination Operations

author: Yuka Hayashi
title: Trump Administration Shuffles CFPB’s Lending-Discrimination Operations
text:
WASHINGTON—The Trump administration has revamped the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau’s lending-discrimination operations, an agency spokesman said Thursday, the latest step in a broad review of the bureau’s activities under its new director.
The changes place the consumer-finance regulator’s Office of Fair Lending and Equal Opportunity under the direct control of acting director Mick Mulvaney, a longtime bureau critic appointed by President Donald Trump in November.
...
